tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: One of my tooth was broke  and i had severe pain and was not able to eat. So i visited tanzi dental Alwarpet and Met Dr. Imran, he took my tooth x ray and said that the tooth can be saved. So first day only root canal was done and said to wait for two days. Then from the next day didn't have pain atal. After two days when I went Dr. Imran placed some post as my tooth is broken and to strengthen the tooth after which a new crown was given. I am able to eat and it's like normal tooth. Overall I had a great experience , very comfortable and friendly staff.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Had an amazing experience in tanzi dental clinic. The clinic had all latest technologies from OPG x-rays and scanners. With accurate diagnosis, the doctors are able to provide immediate pain relief and long lasting treatment options. Will recommend this clinic for all dental needs at affordable costs

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
I consulted Dr.Imran for my Root Canal Treatment. Dr.Imran patiently diagnosed my situation and suggested full mouth root canal treatment and crown. Through a series of sessions the treatment was carried to my utmost satisfaction. I thank Dr.Imran and also thank Dr. Pavithra ( Assistant Doctor ) for extending their full expertise in taking care of my dental issues. They have been very friendly and patient to guide me correctly and also clear all my doubts whenever I sought for explanations. Earlier I had lot of infections and had problem in proper eating. However after the treatment I am back to normal. I am very happy that my dental issues were taken care of very well.

I will be very pleased to recommend the services of Dr.Imran and his team to anyone facing dental issues.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: **** ******* * **** *******  *** I liked the treatment and they given me my smile back and very happy. My lower teeth were shaking from many day I had pain. So Dr.Imran check and explained everything about zirconia crowns and fixed my teeth. He advised to remove few teeth as it was mobile. I was scared of getting the tooth removed. But the way he handled and removed my teeth was so good I dint even feel any pain while removing. After which he asked to wait for 2 weeks , later the measurements were taken and fixed the teeth in 4 days. No one can identify it's artificial. Very caring and professional work done. I am very happy with my new teeth now .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Importance of a Dentist in our daily I realised after visiting Tanzi Dental. I was roaming everywhere for my wife she had multiple dental issue. My relative recommended this place very humble Dr Imran and Dr Tanzila they did a great job now my wife is pain free and she got all her teeth today. They explained every procedure very neatly and what has to be done. No words to explain my happiness I was so much worried for my wife. We had sleepless nights because of this dental problem. Finally I thank Dr Imran and Dr Tanzi and duty doctors and staffs. Thank you to the entire team.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I wanted a special type of bridge called hygienic pontic, I visited many doctors as none of them had heard about it. This is the first clinic which offered me rhis bridge. Root canal was performed by a specialist endodontist. The mould was made by a prosthodontist. I also had my tooth extracted, it was complicated as the roots were joint in centre and involved bone cutting. This too was done by a maxillofacial surgeon, painless and in about 15 minutes. The clinic is the best I have visited, services are reasonably priced, all equipments were disinfected before use. I am very happy.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Wisdom Tooth Extraction,
review: Thanks to Dr. Imran and team.I am working at Banglore and my Boss suggested me to visit Tanzi dental. Excellent hospitality I came to chennai reached early moring around 6.30am and called to clinic number they immediately responded and opened the clinic only for me as I have come from Banglore. I was having severe pain in my tooth from past one month and i got treated from 2 specilaists. Really I can't tell in words they are very much skilled and  happy that i dont have pain now. I was suffering alot,now I am tension free and cudos to the team. Affording prices for a common people like us.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I am very happy with the treatment and feeling very much better after the treatment. I was so much worried about my pain and facing so many issues. ******** ** **** ************* *** found out what was my exact problem. I was  have pan chewing habits and found there was some issue with my gums and teeth. I was really scared thinking that it was a cancer. Thank you Dr.Imran for calming me down saying noting to worry. He helped me out in stopping my habit and he cleaned my teeth taking so much time. He suggested me some medicines and I use to have severe headach, ear pain and all. He gave me a soft splint to wear it during night and I can see magic in it. In few days even that pain is reduced and I am very much satisfied now. Painfree and able to eat well also. Treatment wise everything is very perfect. Highly recommended

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I am basically from Bangalore and came chennai for my work purpose. I was having severe pain and was not able to tolerate the pain in my tooth and as it is sunday i was calling so many clinics and most of which were closed and searched in Justdial  and found Tanzi dental is open. i visited the clinic and doctor attended immediatly and understood my pain and the reason for it. They hospitality is so good and they treated me atmost care. I can say this clinic is having the best staff and they work is very clean and professional . Dr.Imran helped me from the beginning and completed the procedure painfree. I am happy with his treatment

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I went through lot of reviews for search of best dental clinic near Mylapore and finally choose this clinic and believe me I was in good hands. Consulted for tooth decay and root canal treatment. Amazed with the hospitality and treatment. Staff were so kind and got treatment from specialised doctors. Got my tooth decay treatment done by one doctor, root canal by another doctor and Dr. Imran fixed cap. 
Totally satisfied by the treatment. I Will not hesitate to recommend this clinic and strongly suggest Tanzi dental for dental treatments.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,Treatment satisfaction,
review: It was my first visted to Tanzi dental Mylapore. It looks very clean and well maintained starting from front desk to the treatment rooms.And I should appreciate the working staff and the doctors they hospitality is so good and they make u feel so comfortable. I usually use to be scared to go to a doctor or any clinic but here it's completely different Dr.Imran sir and Dr.Tanzila both are cool. They talk to you as a friend and they approach is very fabulous. They use all advance technology and quality treatment. I would like to give 5star  overall.I met with an accident  I was having few broken front teeth and one tooth was fully broken and doctor advised to be removed. After removing they waited for few days until then I was given a temporary crown which looked like original teeth. Later I was called for the final measure and after 3 days my permanent crowns were fixed. After fixing I was very happy seeing it. It looks same like how it use to be before and no one can identify it's artificial. 👍🏻to the  team

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I had severe pain and visited Dr. imran. He removed my teeth pai  free and the clinic is very good. I got follow up call the next day to know how am I feeling. Clinic is very clean and hygenic. Dr. Imran is a perfect dentist for me and my family. I recommend tanzi dental for all dental treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I visited Tanzi Dental clinic for replacement of my teeth. Dr Imran examined and explained the whole treatment plan patiently. Multiple teeth were extracted followed by full mouth denture. Extraction was comfortable with no complication. Complete denture was delivered and I am extremely happy with the fit and smile. The staffs were friendly and special mention about the follow up car by Tanzi Dental team. I recommend this clinic for all dental treatments.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I had a decay in my front tooth and had pain from 1 month. And I visited tanzi dental and met Dr.Tanzila. she checked and advised to get a root canal and a crown. Dr.Imran did the whole procedure and gave a very beautiful zirconia crown. No one noticed it was artificial it was looking so natural. And pain is reduced now. I would like to thank the whole team. I had a very satisfied experience .

My mom was very happy after and her teeth looks really beautiful

The treatment was for my mother and it came out really good and the doctor was really kind and caring … my mom came with full of pain and her tooth was in really a bad condition. Now her pain is completely resolved and a new crown is placed … would like to give more than 5 star .. 100% recommend …

And I'm very satisfied.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I came from Calcutta through my friend referral. I had severe headache and both upper and lower jaw pain. I visited many clinics but i dint get a proper diagnosis and relief and many dentist scared me that surgeries to be done. I was very afraid and I came to Tanzi Dental Dr. Imran he checked everything and said about my joint problem, first he started with basic cleaning procedure and gave me a clip type soft guard and right now I can feel much difference in my pain. And later he suggested wisdom tooth removal. I'm done with wisdom teeth removal also. They all are experienced doctors and I feel better after my removal also no pain during the procedure. After ten days they have called for a checkup also, hopefully I got a confidence through them definitely I will recover from this problem. Thank you Dr. Imran for giving me such a positive results .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,

Dr.K.M Imran sheriff treated my tooth problem very soon. Hence he is well known dentist who look after patients very well he also guided me very nicely though after the treatment as well. I would like to thank both the doctors for there initiations.It was a 5 star treatment and I would like to recommend do visit Tanzi dental clinic.

He tooth week time complete all the steps which include measurements, trial and all.  And finally he gave a complete set of denture and my dad was so happy with it.  No one can find out he got a dentures.,  it was completely looking natural. Very satisfied and now my dad as able to eat well with the dentures
